Player History
Drafted in 18th round, 281st overall pick, by St. Louis (B) in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/2/2015, off Daniel Hutchings (CHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2015, off Robert James (BRO)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 4/1/2017 to a 1-year deal worth $808,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 5/1/2018 to a minor league deal...
Drove in 6 runs against St. Louis (C) on 8/25/2018...
10/14/2018: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $600,000 per year, for 2 years.
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Injured on 6/29/2020 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for one week...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 3/1/2021 to a minor league contract.
